definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Density functional theory (DFT) of quantum chemistry was briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹了量子化學中的密度泛函理論。

sentences.english: Out of that he concludes charge must be quantized.
sentences.chinese: 出於此結論，他總結出電荷是量子化的。

sentences.english: This is a result of the quantized nature of time-shared multitasking.
sentences.chinese: 這是由分時多任務處理的量子化特性決定的。

sentences.english: We study the nonclassical electronic wave packet in quantized electromagnetic Field.
sentences.chinese: 文中研究了量子化電磁場中非經典電子波包的運動。

sentences.english: Topics of study include quantum chemistry and computer simulation of structures and actions.
sentences.chinese: 課程包括量子化學，計算機模擬結構和行爲等。

sentences.english: Significant biological applications of quantum chemistry are on the increase.
sentences.chinese: 量子化學的重要生物學應用正在不斷增加。

sentences.english: That's the case whenever you have quantized levels.
sentences.chinese: 在那種情況下，不論你的量子化能級在哪。

sentences.english: The present work provides a useful way to deal with quantum chemistry calculations of the kind of molecular crystals like urea.
sentences.chinese: 提供了一種解決分子晶體量子化學理論計算的新思路。

sentences.english: Quantum chemistry is in its infancy.
sentences.chinese: 量子化學仍處於發展初期。

sentences.english: The quantal features can be obtained by the canonical procedure of quantization.
sentences.chinese: 量子特徵可用正則量子化方式得到。

sentences.english: The modes of vibration in that string are quantized.
sentences.chinese: 在那條弦上的震動模式是量子化的。

sentences.english: The basic principle and theory of quantum chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 量子化學理論計算方法的基本原理。

sentences.english: The quantization of vortices has also been discussed in the relativistic superfluid in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 另外還討論了相對論性超流體中的渦旋量子化。

sentences.english: The quartal features can be obtained by the canonical procedure of quantization.
sentences.chinese: 量子特徵可用正則量子化方式得到。

sentences.english: The macroscopic quantization of circulating current is an attractive property of superfluids.
sentences.chinese: 環流的宏觀量子化是超流體最引人矚目的性質之一。

pinyin: bu4 que4 ding4 xing4 yuan2 li3
liang4 zi3 dian4 dong4 li4 xue2
